title: Modular Certification Pathways | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: SIT's Modular Certification Pathways comprise bite-sized modules that stack towards SIT Specialist Certificates and Postgraduate Qualifications.

text_lines: Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Enjoy flexibility with bite-sized modules that stack towards various qualifications at SIT.

Interested to develop your skills and qualifications, but short on time or resources to commit? Enrol in bite-sized modules that earn credits stackable towards various qualifications. Upskill at your own pace with SIT
Each module can be taken individually or stacked towards a Specialist Certificate, Graduate Certificate, or Graduate Diploma.
Each modular certification pathway has a different set of minimum entry requirements
Applicants who do not meet the minimum entry requirements but come with skills and knowledge from prior learning may be considered, subject to approval
You can choose to take modules that are part of the Modular Certification Pathway and have the option of a flexible pace that fits your schedule.
Whether a "one module-at a time" approach for busy individuals, or a conventional path for a mid-career gap year, the eventual outcome is still the same.
Flexible learning tailored to your needs and career path. Start with relevant modules and progress as you grow. Hone existing skillsets as you earn your certification.

"Since it is not easy to work and study simultaneously, I feel that choosing a flexible and progressive programme is very important and more manageable. SIT's Postgraduate Diploma in Sonography modules are stackable in nature and can be completed up to a 5-year period."
Principal Radiographer, Singapore General Hospital, Holder of PGDiploma in Sonography
"It truly felt like continuous learning and application. It is very suitable for those looking to upgrade themselves in their career."
Project Manager, SOE Engineering, Holder of PGCert in Electrical and Electronic Engineering

The Graduate Certificate in Adult and Geriatric Rehabilitation (Modular Certification Pathway) equips allied health professionals with clinical-focused skills to address the healthcare needs of Singapore's ageing population.
Graduate Certificate in Adult and Geriatric Rehabilitation

The Postgraduate Certificate in Building Services Engineering (Modular Certification Pathway) is designed to address industry needs to reskill, deepen skills, upskill, and increase knowledge of industry professionals in building services engineering.
Postgraduate Certificate in Building Services Engineering

The Postgraduate Certificate in Civil Engineering (Modular Certification Pathway) is designed to equip engineers with specialised technical and practical skills to help the industry address increasingly complex civil engineering problems in a creative and sustainable way.

The Postgraduate Certificate in Data Engineering and Smart Factory (Modular Certification Pathway) is motivated by the need for engineering companies to upgrade their workforce to enable their business to stay competitive amidst the exponential growth in robotic automation, information and communication technologies.
Postgraduate Certificate in Data Engineering and Smart Factory
Data Science and Analytics, Internet of Things

The Postgraduate Certificate in Design Strategy and Innovation (Modular Certification Pathway) provides hands-on design innovation training applicable to current industry needs for candidates from any field.
Postgraduate Certificate in Design Strategy and Innovation

The Postgraduate Certificate in Electrical and Electronic Engineering (Modular Certification Pathway) is designed to equip graduates and professionals for a career in the power and energy sector. The modules offer deep knowledge of modern electrical engineering technologies, coupled with a strong focus on industrial design in power and energy applications.
Postgraduate Certificate in Electrical and Electronic Engineering
Electrical Engineering, Power and Clean Energy
The Graduate Certificate in Fire Dynamics and Fire Modelling (Modular Certification Pathway) is designed to equip learners with essential knowledge and skills in fire safety engineering.
Graduate Certificate in Fire Dynamics and Fire Modelling

The Graduate Certificate in Medical Sonography (Modular Certification Pathway) equips sonographers with professional knowledge and advanced skills, enabling them to work as highly proficient ultrasound practitioners.
The Graduate Certificate in Musculoskeletal Physiotherapy (Modular Certification Pathway) equips physiotherapists with skills in managing pain and dysfunction using a holistic approach.
The Graduate Certificate in Organ Transplant Nursing (Modular Certification Pathway) equips nurses with specialised skills for post-transplant care and rehabilitation.
Graduate Certificate in Organ Transplant Nursing
Process Safety Management and Engineering Design

The Graduate Certificate in Process Safety Management and Engineering Design  (Modular Certification Pathway) is designed to equip learners with skills to enhance safety, reliability, and efficiency in high-risk industries.
Graduate Certificate in Process Safety Management and Engineering Design

The Graduate Certificate in Process Safety Operations (Modular Certification Pathway) is designed to help individuals, who are tasked with safety responsibilities, gain the engineering and management expertise to operate a plant safely.
Graduate Certificate in Process Safety Operations
The Graduate Certificate in Rehabilitation Nursing (Modular Certification Pathway) equips nurses with essential skills in leadership, advocacy, and multidisciplinary rehabilitation practices.

The Graduate Certificate in Sustainability is designed to equip professionals with the sustainability-related expertise to navigate industry demands, regulatory shifts, and sustainability challenges in the evolving landscape.
Sustainability, Business Management, Accounting and Finance

The Postgraduate Certificate in Urban Railway Technology (Modular Certification Pathway) is designed to equip engineering professionals with specialised technical and practical skills to further provide a safe, efficient, and reliable mass rapid transit system in Singapore.
Postgraduate Certificate in Urban Railway Technology
There are no upcoming events at the moment.
Discover courses that can enhance your skillset, elevate your career, and take it to the next level.
Subscribe now and receive our brochure for the latest updates on our courses, events and insights.
By clicking "Subscribe", you agree to our "

" and also agree that SIT (and its service providers and agents) may collect, use, disclose and/or process your personal data to send you information related to the topic(s) of interest you have selected above, which may include information on courses, seminars, events, resources and/or surveys offered by SIT and/or its Overseas University partners.

We look forward to journeying with you on your path of lifelong learning. You can manage your preferences or unsubscribe at any time through the links provided in our communications. To learn more about how SIT protects your personal data, you may refer to SIT's Personal Data Protection Policy

Exciting news! We are introducing new micro-credentials in Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Be among the first to know by registering your interest today!
SIT reserves the right to make changes to published course information, including dates, times, venues, fees and instructors without prior notice.
Singapore Institute of Technology. All Rights Reserved.

article_texts:
Modular Certification Pathways
Enjoy flexibility with bite-sized modules that stack towards various qualifications at SIT.
Earn a stackable certificate
Interested to develop your skills and qualifications, but short on time or resources to commit? Enrol in bite-sized modules that earn credits stackable towards various qualifications. Upskill at your own pace with SIT
LEARN's
Modular Certification Pathways.
Each module can be taken individually or stacked towards a Specialist Certificate, Graduate Certificate, or Graduate Diploma.
Eligibility
Each modular certification pathway has a different set of minimum entry requirements
Applicants who do not meet the minimum entry requirements but come with skills and knowledge from prior learning may be considered, subject to approval
Benefits
Flexible pace
You can choose to take modules that are part of the Modular Certification Pathway and have the option of a flexible pace that fits your schedule.
Targeted outcome
Whether a "one module-at a time" approach for busy individuals, or a conventional path for a mid-career gap year, the eventual outcome is still the same.
Progressive commitment
Flexible learning tailored to your needs and career path. Start with relevant modules and progress as you grow. Hone existing skillsets as you earn your certification.
"Since it is not easy to work and study simultaneously, I feel that choosing a flexible and progressive programme is very important and more manageable. SIT's Postgraduate Diploma in Sonography modules are stackable in nature and can be completed up to a 5-year period."
Florence Tan
Principal Radiographer, Singapore General Hospital, Holder of PGDiploma in Sonography
"It truly felt like continuous learning and application. It is very suitable for those looking to upgrade themselves in their career."
Loo Yee Chye
Project Manager, SOE Engineering, Holder of PGCert in Electrical and Electronic Engineering

here
.
updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");

    function updateCheckboxVal(attrName) {
        if (attrName) {
            var checkboxName = attrName + "_checkbox";
            var intAttr = document.getElementsByName(attrName);
            var intCheckbox = document.getElementsByName(checkboxName);
            if (intCheckbox && intAttr) {
                intAttr[0].value = intCheckbox[0].checked;
            }
        }
    }

    function updatesUponSubmit() {
        var checkboxes = document.querySelectorAll('[data-group="check-box-group"]');
        var boxSelected = false;
        for (var i = 0, l = checkboxes.length; i < l; i++) {
            if (checkboxes[i].checked) {
                boxSelected = true;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (boxSelected) {
            var gmt8Date = new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-US", { timeZone: "Asia/Singapore" });
            const now = new Date().toUTCString();
            var optinEmailDate = document.getElementsByName("OptinEmailDate");
            var createdDate = document.getElementsByName("CreatedDate");
            var formSubmissionDate = document.getElementsByName("FormSubmissionDate");
            var primaryKey = document.getElementsByName("PrimaryKey");
            var getEmail = document.getElementById("email").value;
            var getWebsource = document.getElementById("websourceID").value;

            optinEmailDate[0].value = now;
            createdDate[0].value = now;
            formSubmissionDate[0].value = now;
            primaryKey[0].value = getEmail + getWebsource + gmt8Date;
			
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");
			
        } else {
            var checkboxes = document.querySelector('.error-message');
            checkboxes.classList.add('active');
            return false;
        }
    }
